about_the_game:
Devil’s Island is a zombie horror survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world that has already met its end. In this desolate landscape, you’ll grapple with nature within a typical taiga forest, managing hunger, thirst, health, and resources. Explore the forest, collect mushrooms, craft items and weapons, and cook raw meat to survive.

Story: As a mercenary, you’re dispatched to Devil’s Island to uncover its secrets and the source of the apocalypse. Prepare to confront zombies, other creatures, traps, and puzzles. Delve into the enigma of humanity’s origin and its connection to extraterrestrial beings, blending elements from various religions and myths.

The game offers dynamic first-person gameplay, where every misstep and hasty decision can prove fatal. Utilize melee weapons, firearms, and special skills. With stunning graphics and immersive sound design, Devil’s Island creates an atmosphere of post-apocalyptic horror and tension. It’s a must-play for fans of zombies, survival, and Anunnaki lore, promising hours of thrilling gameplay.
